westhaven_missing_blacksmith.name: Missing Blacksmith in Westhaven
westhaven_missing_blacksmith.text: Rumor has it that the blacksmith in Westhaven has gone missing under... mysterious circumstances.

tarn_wants_to_retire.name: Tarn Wants to Retire
tarn_wants_to_retire.text: Tarn has been overheard expressing a desire to retire from his shopkeeping duties and travel the world.
